titleStmt.title: The memoirs of James, Lord Audley, Earl of Castlehaven, his engagement and carriage in the wars of Ireland from the year 1642 to the year 1651 written by himself.
titleStmt.author: Castlehaven, James Touchet, Earl of, 1617?-1684.

notesStmt.note: First edition, which is "said to have been suppressed by the author."--Lowndes, v. 1, p. 387.
